notesStmt.note: Text breaks denoted by a punctus, plus variable spaces. A folio from Hilkhot Shabbat chapter 5. The fragment contains the text parallel to, in the common, Vilna edition, 24a l. 24 מדאיכפילו to 24b l. 26 בקלסטר. Based on Talmud Shabbat 51b-53a.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library
